snippet: Secretary of Defense Leon E. Panetta and Gen. Martin E. Dempsey said they would strictly enforce standards for their most senior officers.
abstract: Defense Sec Leon E Panetta and Gen Martin E Dempsey, chairman of Joint Chiefs of Staff, say they will strictly enforce ethical standards for their most senior officers in light of string of scandals within military.

byline.original: By THOM SHANKER and ELISABETH BUMILLER
byline.contributor: Thom Shanker reported from Washington, and Elisabeth Bumiller from Bangkok. Scott Shane contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Secretary of Defense Leon E. Panetta and Gen. Martin E. Dempsey said they would strictly enforce standards for their most senior officers.

headline.seo: Panetta and General Dempsey to Review Military Ethics

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
